official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require disclosure of certain information about benefit management for prescription drugs by Medicare+Choice organizations.

summary.text: Medicare+Choice Pharmaceutical Management Act of 1998 - Amends part C (Medicare+Choice) of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to require Medicare+Choice organizations to provide the Secretary of Health and Human Services with annual disclosures of their pharmaceutical benefit management activities.

titles.title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require disclosure of certain information about benefit management for prescription drugs by Medicare+Choice organizations.
